"Every defeat of hierarchy strengthens democracy. When kings fall, their power flows to all. When queens share their might, everyone becomes royal!"

How It Works:

  1. Piece Captured: Their moves distribute to ALL remaining pieces (both sides!)
  2. First King Falls: Democracy option unlocks - teams can cooperate
  3. Power Accumulates: Pieces become increasingly equal
  4. Final State: All pieces have identical abilities = pure democracy!

The Beautiful Paradox: Your enemy's hierarchy's death makes YOUR pieces more powerful too!
